    • Method Detail

      • getCause

        public String getCause()

        What triggered the event.

      • getDescription

        public String getDescription()

        Human readable description of the cause. Note: Changes to event descriptions are not considered breaking, so your integration should not parse these messages, using details[cause] and/or details[reason_code] instead.

      • getOrigin

        public Event.Details.Origin getOrigin()

        Who initiated the event. One of:

        • bank: this event was triggered by a report from the banks
        • gocardless: this event was performed by GoCardless automatically

        • `api`: this event was triggered by an API endpoint

      • getReasonCode

        public String getReasonCode()

        Set when a bank is the origin of the event. This is the reason code received in the report from the customer’s bank. See the GoCardless Direct Debit guide for information on the meanings of different reason codes.

      • getReportType

        public Event.Details.ReportType getReportType()

        The report that this message was received in. One of:

        • auddis: Automated Direct Debit Instruction Service
        • addacs: Automated Direct Debit Amendment and Cancellation Service
        • arudd: Automated Return of Unpaid Direct Debit
        • ddica: Direct Debit Indemnity Claim Advice
        • processing: SEPA processing report

        • `settlement`: SEPA settlement report

      • getScheme

        public Event.Details.Scheme getScheme()

        Set when a bank is the origin of the event.
